Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Warner
Reviews.Content: great little camera, but telephoto shots blur easily, and any movement what so ever effects the final picture.  Close up and group shots are fine, camera is light weight and a great travel camera.  Case arrived without carrying strap.  Everything else in the bundle was fine.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: pjralaska
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for those who don't need the professional over kill on things the average person will not use. I have some post card quality pics of some bears and musk ox from here in Alaska. I love this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Avril Ano
Reviews.Content: As a photograph amateur, this camera was a step higher than any of my previous one...the picture a clear and beautiful....will most definitely recommend it

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: A. Riggs "Samriggs"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it enough to give a complete review, but so far I like it.  Easy to use, great zoom, comfortable to hold.  Picture quality seems to be really good.  Will give it a better workout in coming months.
